issue.title: Gas detection fails near wall (Urban Practice 1)

content.raw:
Arthur, thanks for investigation - yes it is the place you draw the circle. I do not have the ROS bag \(too big, running on AWS\), so I have only OSGAR logs:

‌

```
M:\git\osgar>python -m osgar.logger --stream rosmsg.gas_detected --times e:\osgar\logs\subt3-urban\aws\ver44p1\aws-ver44p1-B90F900R.log
0:00:03.034710 22 False
0:35:44.472578 22 True
0:40:12.098956 22 False
0:40:16.214098 22 True
```

and picture:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3563840698-aws-ver44p1-small.jpg)
‌
